summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of 35th Avenue from South line of East Olive Street to the North line of East James Street in the City of Seattle, by asphalt paving under Ordinance No. 12171, creating Local Improvement District No. 1045 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
